name: Time use in Sweden - Statistics Sweden
title: Time use in Sweden - Statistics Sweden
description: For the original data, see Table 1 in the 1990 Sweden Statistics time use report; Table B:4 in the 2000 report; and Table B:1a in the 2010 report.

fields.name: Time allocation, weekday, women
fields.description: Average minutes spent on a particular activity, by women, on a weekday.

fields.name: Time allocation, weekend, women
fields.description: Average minutes spent on a particular activity, by women, on the weekend.

fields.name: Time allocation, weekday, men
fields.description: Average minutes spent on a particular activity, by men, on a weekday.

fields.name: Time allocation, weekend, men
fields.description: Average minutes spent on a particular activity, by men, on a weekend.

fields.name: Time allocation, average day, women
fields.description:
Average time spent on a particular activity, by women, on an average day. Estimates take a weighted average of minutes spent on a particular activity on weekdays and on the weekend. 

For example, time spent on leisure on an average day is calculated as: 
Leisure_averageday = (5/7)*Leisure_weekday + (2/7)*Leisure_weekend

fields.name: Time allocation, average day, men
fields.description:
Average time spent on a particular activity, by men, on an average day. Estimates take a weighted average of minutes spent on a particular activity on weekdays and on the weekend. 

For example, time spent on leisure on an average day is calculated as: 
Leisure_averageday = (5/7)*Leisure_weekday + (2/7)*Leisure_weekend
